content: Describe the image segment provided ({image_url}), using the context of the full page it came from ({page_image_url}) if necessary. Use and maintain all values and text from the image. Additionally and optionally, if the picture can logically be converted into a table, do so. Do not turn schematics into ASCII representations. Be detailed, include any visible text. Use markdown to structure the text. Output the text directly in ```markdown``` tags.
